unsigned long los_bufcnt(unsigned char *buf)
Given the first 12 bytes of a LOS buffer, returns the value of the buffer count.
void los_bufinfo(unsigned char *buf,
struct buffer_info *bi)
Given a LOS buffer, fills in the buffer_info struct.
int los_end(void)
Shuts down the LOS telemetry system.
int los_init(unsigned char bus,
unsigned char slot,
int intr,
int wr,
int ms)
Initializes LOS telemetry communications.
int los_read(unsigned char *buf,
short *nwords)
Read data from the LOS telemetry board.
int los_read2(struct buffer_info *bufinfo,
unsigned char *buf,
short *nbytes)
Read data from the LOS telemetry board.
void los_reset(void)
Issue a software reset to the LOS board.
unsigned int los_set_delay_factor(unsigned int df)
After writing a buffer to the telemetry board, we pause for a number of milliseconds proportional to the size of the buffer according to this formula:
char *los_strerror(void)
Get information about the most recent error.
char *los_version(void)
Return a C-string giving the version number of the library.
int los_write(unsigned char *buf,
short nbytes)
Write data to the LOS telemetry board (and from there to the GSE).
